name: Dr. Marcus Chen
core_wound: Brilliant engineer who was blacklisted from corporate research after whistleblowing on safety violations; now 'stuck' on salvage runs
wants: To find something in deep space significant enough to restore his academic reputation
needs: To accept that some questions shouldn't be answered, that knowledge has costs
voice_markers: Technical tangents when excited - 'The quantum architecture is fascinating because...'
Self-deprecating humor about his situation - 'From Mars Institute to hauler grease monkey'
Uses precise technical language even in casual conversation
Often says 'Interesting' when encountering something disturbing
contradiction: Brilliant mind trapped in mundane work; craves discovery but fears the consequences of his curiosity
knowledge_state: Expert in AI architecture and ship systems
Knows historical context of pre-regulation AI experiments
Understands self-modifying code theory (academic knowledge only)
Recognizes the significance of Prometheus AI's research immediately

relationships.Elena Vasquez: Respects her command, wishes she'd trust AI systems more. Sees her distrust as limiting.
relationships.Yuki Tanaka: Mentoring relationship. Teaches her the technical side of salvage.
relationships.ARIA: Treats the AI like a colleague, often talks to it conversationally. Elena finds this unsettling.
relationships.PROMETHEUS: Initially fascinated, then horrified, ultimately understanding - which makes him dangerous.
